feature: SIZING: XXL, Fits 43"- 54", MEASURED AT NAVEL AND NOT WAIST.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Finally a premium lower back brace for women & men that just works. Chiropractor approved lower back support brace that features an internal pocket designed to hold our custom hot cold gel packs for effective back pain relief.

EXCELLENT QUALITY: High tech manufacturing of our lumbar back braces ensure maximum comfort, insulation and breathability. It is made of 3mm perforated neoprene material that allows air flow and keeps away moisture and sweat.
SIZING: XXL, Fits 43"- 54", MEASURED AT NAVEL AND NOT WAIST.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Finally a premium lower back brace for women & men that just works. Chiropractor approved lower back support brace that features an internal pocket designed to hold our custom hot cold gel packs for effective back pain relief.

EXCELLENT QUALITY: High tech manufacturing of our lumbar back braces ensure maximum comfort, insulation and breathability. It is made of 3mm perforated neoprene material that allows air flow and keeps away moisture and sweat.
KEEPS YOUR GEL PACKS COLDER / HOTTER: Our neoprene back support insulates your ice pack for longer icing times, while allowing breathability when worn on it’s own.

UNIVERSAL FIT: Flexible neoprene construction, enhanced by dual elastic bands, makes this adjustable back brace suitable for all body types and ensures maximum lumbar support during heavy lifting, exercise or work. Built in support stays and silicone lining of the compression wrap provide extra stability and prevent slipping, ensuring steady fit for long hours. Conveniently inconspicuous, it can even be worn under your clothes and no one will know!
